name: Little Starfish
description:
You are a little dead starfish, but death is not the end it is only the start of new life! You have to eat to gain strength and one day became a powerful and almighty creature!

Skinner Space - game designer; Haiyoooo - artist

CONTROLS

WASD or arrows to move

Made for those game jams:

Mini Jam 81: Kaiju 

WeeklyGameJam 203: Eat Your Enemy

———

Download art assets here https://haiyoooo.itch.io/art-starfish-kaijun-assets
